-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local ET = ET
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  -- 分发数值监听
  namespace.class("NumericChangeEvent_NotifyWatcher", function (namespace)
    local Run
    Run = function (this, args)
      return System.async(function (async, this, args)
        ET.NumericWatcherComponent.Instance:Run(args.NumericType, args.Parent.Id, args.New)
        async:Await(ET.ETTask.getCompletedTask())
      end, nil, this, args)
    end
    return {
      base = function (out)
        return {
          out.ET.AEvent_1(out.ET.EventType.NumbericChange)
        }
      end,
      Run = Run
    }
  end)
end)
